text: Younger star Nico Tortorella has come out as gender - fluid in a candid interview — all while undergoing a full drag makeover with the help of a RuPaul's Drag Race star. Nico, 29, who plays heartthrob Josh, a hip tattoo artist who falls for a woman in her forties in TV Land's hit series Younger, has previously identified as sexually fluid and bisexual. In March, Nico tied the knot with Bethany Meyers, a fitness instructor who identifies as gay, and with whom the actor has been in a polyamorous relationship for a decade.
